Class Driver

java.lang.Object
  Driver
Direct Known Subclasses:
TildeDriver
public abstract class Driver
extends Object

Abstract class Driver - Can be any type of data model driver.

Author:
David Ball

Method Detail

close

public abstract void close()
Closes an open data connection.

isOpen

public abstract boolean isOpen()
Checks to see if a connection is still alive.

Returns:
true if opened, false otherwise

nextRow

public abstract Row nextRow()
Gets the next row.

Returns:
Row or null when no more rows.

open

public abstract boolean open(String connectionString)
Opens a data connection.

Parameters:
connectionString - any valid connection string, varies by driver
Returns:
true if opened, false otherwise, may throw an Exception if it wants to

query

public abstract Relation query(String queryString)
Runs a query.

Parameters:
queryString - any valid query string, varies by driver
Returns:
Relation or null.

rewind

public abstract void rewind()
Rewinds back to the beginning of the result set. If not possible, throw an Exception.
